spinehx.atlas.AtlasRegion

type
class
extends
TextureRegion
defined in
spinehx.atlas.TextureAtlas
Describes the region of a packed image and provides information about the original image before it was packed.

Static Methods

copy(region : AtlasRegion) : AtlasRegion

create(texture : Texture, x : Int, y : Int, width : Int, height : Int) : AtlasRegion

Constructor

new()

Instance Variables hide inherited show inherited

index : Int

The number at the end of the original image file name, or -1 if none.

When sprites are packed, if the original file name ends with a number, it is stored as the index and is not considered as part of the sprite's name. This is useful for keeping animation frames in order.

name : String

The name of the original image file, up to the first underscore. Underscores denote special instructions to the texture packer.

offsetX : Float

The offset from the left of the original image to the left of the packed image, after whitespace was removed for packing.

offsetY : Float

The offset from the bottom of the original image to the bottom of the packed image, after whitespace was removed for packing.

originalHeight : Int

The height of the image, before whitespace was removed for packing.

originalWidth : Int

The width of the image, before whitespace was removed and rotation was applied for packing.

packedHeight : Int

The height of the image, after whitespace was removed for packing.

packedWidth : Int

The width of the image, after whitespace was removed for packing.

pads : Array<Int>

The ninepatch pads, or null if not a ninepatch or the has no padding. Has 4 elements: left, right, top, bottom.

regionHeight : Int

inherited from spinehx.atlas.TextureRegion

regionWidth : Int

inherited from spinehx.atlas.TextureRegion

rotate : Bool

If true, the region has been rotated 90 degrees counter clockwise.

splits : Array<Int>

The ninepatch splits, or null if not a ninepatch. Has 4 elements: left, right, top, bottom.

texture : Texture

inherited from spinehx.atlas.TextureRegion

inherited from spinehx.atlas.TextureRegion

inherited from spinehx.atlas.TextureRegion

v : Float

inherited from spinehx.atlas.TextureRegion

inherited from spinehx.atlas.TextureRegion

Instance Methods hide inherited show inherited

flip(x : Bool, y : Bool) : Void

overrides spinehx.atlas.TextureRegion
Flips the region, adjusting the offset so the image appears to be flip as if no whitespace has been removed for packing.

getRegionHeight() : Int

inherited from spinehx.atlas.TextureRegion
Returns the region's height.

getRegionWidth() : Int

inherited from spinehx.atlas.TextureRegion
Returns the region's width.

getRegionX() : Int

inherited from spinehx.atlas.TextureRegion

getRegionY() : Int

inherited from spinehx.atlas.TextureRegion

getRotatedPackedHeight() : Float

Returns the packed height considering the rotate value, if it is true then it returns the packedWidth, otherwise it returns the packedHeight.

getRotatedPackedWidth() : Float

Returns the packed width considering the rotate value, if it is true then it returns the packedHeight, otherwise it returns the packedWidth.

scroll(xAmount : Float, yAmount : Float) : Void

inherited from spinehx.atlas.TextureRegion
parameters
xAmount The percentage to offset horizontally.
yAmount The percentage to offset vertically. This is done in texture space, so up is negative.
Offsets the region relative to the current region. Generally the region's size should be the entire size of the texture in the direction(s) it is scrolled.

setRegionCopy(region : TextureRegion) : Void

inherited from spinehx.atlas.TextureRegion
Sets the texture and coordinates to the specified region.

setRegionHeight(height : Int) : Void

inherited from spinehx.atlas.TextureRegion

setRegionRelXYWH(region : TextureRegion, x : Int, y : Int, width : Int, height : Int) : Void

inherited from spinehx.atlas.TextureRegion
Sets the texture to that of the specified region and sets the coordinates relative to the specified region.

setRegionTex(texture : Texture) : Void

inherited from spinehx.atlas.TextureRegion
Sets the texture and sets the coordinates to the size of the specified texture.

setRegionUV(u : Float, v : Float, u2 : Float, v2 : Float) : Void

setRegionXYWH(x : Int, y : Int, width : Int, height : Int) : Void

inherited from spinehx.atlas.TextureRegion
parameters
width The width of the texture region. May be negative to flip the sprite when drawn.
height The height of the texture region. May be negative to flip the sprite when drawn.

split(tileWidth : Int, tileHeight : Int) : Array<Array<TextureRegion>>

inherited from spinehx.atlas.TextureRegion
parameters
tileWidth a tile's width in pixels
tileHeight a tile's height in pixels
returns
a 2D array of TextureRegions indexed by [row][column].
Helper function to create tiles out of this TextureRegion starting from the top left corner going to the left and ending at the bottom right corner. Only complete tiles will be returned so if the region's width or height are not a multiple of the tile width and height not all of the region will be used.
